content.value:
Our location is the best in the city; We have 3 of the best shopping centres in the city nearby, the Andean Center, the Retiro Shopping Center, where Andres Carne de Res Restaurant is located and the Atlantis Shopping Center. We are located next to the so-called T-zone where the best restaurants, bars and stores of the city are.

Our rooms and dorms are designed with high hotel standards to offer privacy and comfort during your stay also you will find very comfortable beds, with linen, blankets and pillows of high quality, that will invite you to have an unforgettable rest. The assembly of our rooms and beds is extraordinary!!

Situated in Bogot√° and with T Zone reachable within 1.5 km, Mad Nomad Hostel features concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a bar, free WiFi throughout the property and a shared lounge. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and organising tours for guests.
At the hostel, rooms are fitted with a shared bathroom with a shower.
Mad Nomad Hostel offers a continental or buffet breakfast.
The accommodation also provides a business centre and guests can check the newspapers at Mad Nomad Hostel.
El Campin Stadium is 5 km from the hostel, while Unicentro Shopping Mall is 7 km from the property.

description.description:
A space with the best location in the city that offers you comfort, privacy, security and where you will feel at home.
Meet people from all over the world with whom you can share the best experiences Bogota offers and its gastronomic, cultural and artistic diversity. Live all the experiences that Bogota offers you, 2.600 meters closer to the stars. Staying with us you will be located at the north and best part of the city, where you will find every thing and places you want.
